name: generalizedtestmanager
description: A central point to manage tests for a project.

items.description: Folder paths to monitor for test files. Use absolute paths or workspace-relative paths.

path.description: The path to the folder to monitor. This can be an absolute path or a relative path from the workspace root.

type.description: The type of runner to use for the tests.

python_path.description: The path to the executable for the runner. This can be an absolute path or a relative path from the workspace root.

test_files.description: List of test files to run with this runner.

evidence_collector.description: List of evidence collectors to use with this runner.

use_python_path.description: Whether to use the Python path for this runner.

gtm.folders_to_monitor.description: List of folders to monitor for test files. The extension will watch these folders for changes and update the test list accordingly.

gtm.evidence_location.description: The path to the folder where evidence files will be stored. This can be an absolute path or a relative path from the workspace root.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
